---@class BattleLogicWorld:SimpleClassUtil
local BattleLogicWorld = SimpleClassUtil:class()

function BattleLogicWorld:initialize()
    self._battleLogicContext = BattleLogicContext:new()
end

function BattleLogicWorld:init(blackBoard,battleData,battleManager)
    self._battleLogicContext:init(blackBoard,battleData,battleManager)
end


function BattleLogicWorld:update(dt)
    if self._battleLogicContext then
        self._battleLogicContext:update(dt)
    end
end


function BattleLogicWorld:release()
    if self._battleLogicContext then
        self._battleLogicContext:release()
    end
end

return BattleLogicWorld
